snippet.title: Mastery Challenge Pack 2: New Story, Rewards, and Epic Boss Battle | Assassin's Creed Valhalla
snippet.description:
Prepare yourself and hone your combat skills: new free Mastery Challenge content is available now in Assassin's Creed Valhalla. Mastery Challenge Pack 2 renews the repayable game mode with new shrines, rewards, an epic boss battle, and the conclusion to the narrative line set up in Mastery Challenge. Are you ready for the trials ahead?


For more details on the first set of Mastery Challenges: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uzae_1_DS5k
